unnormalised: So, someone just asked me what "FTW" means. Seriously? Is everyone except *me* living under a rock? Just kidding...mostly. ðŸ˜‰
normalised: So, someone just asked me what F-T-W means. Seriously? Is everyone except *me* living under a rock? Just kidding...mostly.

unnormalised: Okay, okay, I'll 'splain. FTW stands for "For The Win." It's like, you're super psyched about something and want to show your undying support. Think of it as a virtual *dhol* beat for things you love. You know, that super loud drum they play at Indian weddings. Yeah, that level of excitement.
normalised: Okay, okay, I'll 'splain. F-T-W stands for "For The Win." It's like, you're super psyched about something and want to show your undying support. Think of it as a virtual *dhol* beat for things you love. You know, that super loud drum they play at Indian weddings. Yeah, that level of excitement.

unnormalised: So, for example, if you're watching India vs. Pakistan cricket match on your JioFiber connection and Virat Kohli hits a six, you'd yell, "Kohli, FTW!" Or maybe your mom makes the best *aloo paratha* EVER. That's *aloo paratha*, FTW! You get the picture? It's pretty versatile, yaar.
normalised: So, for example, if you're watching India versus Pakistan cricket match on your J-i-o-Fiber connection and Virat Kohli hits a six, you'd yell, "Kohli, F-T-W!" Or maybe your mom makes the best *aloo paratha* ever. That's *aloo paratha*, F-T-W! You get the picture? It's pretty versatile, yaar.

unnormalised: It's basically a millennial/Gen Z thing. But hey, age is just a number. Embrace the internet slang! Before you know it, you'll be using "IYKYK" and "SMH" too. Then youâ€™ll be just as cool as your nephews... or at least close enough to confuse your grandma less.
normalised: It's basically a millennial slash G-e-n Z thing. But hey, age is just a number. Embrace the internet slang! Before you know it, you'll be using "I-Y-K-Y-K" and "S-M-H" too. Then you'll be just as cool as your nephews... or at least close enough to confuse your grandma less.

unnormalised: Now, "SMH" means shaking my head. Its' what I do when people ask what FTW means. Just kidding, again. Sort of.
normalised: Now, "S-M-H" means shaking my head. It's what I do when people ask what F-T-W means. Just kidding, again. Sort of.

unnormalised: But donâ€™t go overboard, okay? Imagine your boss asking for the Q3 report, and you reply with "Q3 report, FTW!". You might be looking for a new job shortly. Use it responsibly, my friends!
normalised: But don't go overboard, okay? Imagine your boss asking for the Q three report, and you reply with "Q three report, F-T-W!". You might be looking for a new job shortly. Use it responsibly, my friends!

unnormalised: Oh, and FYI, "FYI" means "For Your Information". I thought I should include that in case you have to ask what that means. No, I'm just kidding. *SMH*
normalised: Oh, and F-Y-I, "F-Y-I" means "For Your Information". I thought I should include that in case you have to ask what that means. No, I'm just kidding. *S-M-H*

unnormalised: And if you still don't get it after all this, just Google it. I mean, seriously, it's 2024. Google is *everything*. Google, FTW! Okay, Iâ€™ll stop now. But you get the point right?
normalised: And if you still don't get it after all this, just Google it. I mean, seriously, it's two thousand and twenty four. Google is *everything*. Google, F-T-W! Okay, I'll stop now. But you get the point right?
